price: We will surely help Our messengers and those who believe in the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will come forward,
arabic: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
